special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s stares at you intently and a sudden wind buffets you!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s stares intently at <npcname> and a hurricane force wind hits them!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's wind buffets your %2$s, but it doesn't catch hold.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's winds hit <npcname>, but it doesn't catch hold.
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s stares at you, but the wind blows past you!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s's stares at <npcname>, but the wind blows past them!

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s stares at you and a powerful force hurls you through the air!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s stares at <npcname> and a powerful force hurls them through the air!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s stares at you, and you feel a crushing pressure for a moment before the feeling vanishes!
